name: Forsaken Generation
description:
Old School Turn Based Rpg Made With Rpgmaker Mv. Sci-fi & Fantasy storyline30+ Hrs Of Gameplay20+ Dungeons to Explore7 different characters to choose from. (+ 2 Hidden Characters to find)
Each one brings their own TACTICS/BUFF to the combat.Challenging Hardcore Rpg. (no hand-holding Here)
Utilize different ROW BUFFS effectively in combat

YOU must decide whether to DPS or HEAL to SURVIVE.

Flexible TARGETING in combat; to AOE or FOCUS FIRE can be critical in COMBAT.Terrax Lighting EffectsYanfly & Moghunter Plugins
ANDROID APP INCLUDED FREE !
